alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 4:29PM MST until February 21 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Winds of 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph possible. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. In California, Eastern Mojave Desert, Owens Valley and Morongo Basin. In Nevada, Southern Clark County. * WHEN...From 9 AM PST /10 AM MST/ to 8 PM PST /9 PM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will continue to result in blowing dust, hazardous travel, and some power outages through this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These high winds have resulted in several instances of reduced driving visibility and some major traffic accidents in parts of Arizona and southern Nevada. All travelers need to use extreme caution when encountering lowered visibility due to dust.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
